questions.question: Which electrical quantity is measured in volts?

Which type of materials have high resistance and oppose the flow of electric current?

questions.answer: Higher temperature usually increases resistance in metals
options: Higher temperature decreases resistance in metals
Higher temperature usually increases resistance in metals
Temperature has no effect on resistance
Resistance is only affected by material type
questions.question: How does temperature affect resistance in metals?

options: Wire thickness does not affect resistance
questions.question: How does the thickness of a wire affect its resistance?

options: Wire length does not affect resistance
